TABLE.NAME: qtype_lti_options
TABLE.COMMENT: This table contains Basic LTI qtype options

FIELD.NAME: instancecode
FIELD.COMMENT: Instance to be sent and never changes in restore.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course basiclti activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: CMID basiclti activity belongs to. default 0

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Question basic LTI activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: typeid
FIELD.COMMENT: Basic LTI type

FIELD.NAME: toolurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Remote tool url

FIELD.NAME: instructorchoicesendname
FIELD.COMMENT: Send user's name

FIELD.NAME: instructorchoicesendemailaddr
FIELD.COMMENT: Send user's email

FIELD.NAME: instructorchoiceallowroster
FIELD.COMMENT: Allow the roster to be retrieved

FIELD.NAME: instructorchoiceallowsetting
FIELD.COMMENT: Allow a tool to store a setting

FIELD.NAME: instructorcustomparameters
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional custom parameters provided by the instructor

FIELD.NAME: instructorchoiceacceptgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: Accept grades from tool

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Grade scale

FIELD.NAME: launchcontainer
FIELD.COMMENT: Launch external tool in a pop-up

FIELD.NAME: debuglaunch
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable the debug-style launch which pauses before auto-submit

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Tool Provider name

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: Configured = 1, Pending = 2, Accepted = 3, Rejected = 4, Cancelled = 5

FIELD.NAME: capabilityoffered
FIELD.COMMENT: List of capabilities offered, one per line

FIELD.NAME: serviceoffered
FIELD.COMMENT: List of services offered, one per line

FIELD.NAME: toolproxy
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON string representing tool proxy returned by tool provider

FIELD.NAME: createdby
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of user which initiated the registration process

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Date/time at which the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Date/time at which the record was last modified

TABLE.NAME: qtype_lti_types
TABLE.COMMENT: Basic LTI pre-configured activities per course

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity name

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: Active = 1, Pending = 2, Rejected = 3

FIELD.NAME: toolproxyid
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary key of related tool proxy (null for LTI 1 tools)

FIELD.NAME: enabledcapability
FIELD.COMMENT: Enabled capabilities, one per line (null for LTI 1 tools)

FIELD.NAME: parameter
FIELD.COMMENT: Launch parameters, one per line (null for LTI 1 tools)

FIELD.NAME: icon
FIELD.COMMENT: URL to icon file

FIELD.NAME: secureicon
FIELD.COMMENT: Secure URL to icon file

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: A description of what this LTI qtype is.

FIELD.NAME: typeid
FIELD.COMMENT: Basic LTI type id

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Basic LTI param

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: Param value

FIELD.NAME: toolproxyid
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary key of related tool proxy

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary key of course (null for system-wide settings)

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary key of course module - tool link added to course (null for system-wide and context-wide settings)

FIELD.NAME: settings
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting values as JSON

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Date/time at which the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Date/time at which the record was last modified

KEY.NAME: toolproxy
KEY.COMMENT: The tool proxy to which the setting relates

KEY.NAME: course
KEY.COMMENT: The course to which the setting relates

KEY.NAME: questionid
KEY.COMMENT: The question instance to which the setting relates

TABLE.NAME: qtype_lti_submission
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps track of individual submissions for LTI activities.

FIELD.NAME: ltiid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the LTI tool instance

FIELD.NAME: username
FIELD.COMMENT: username in moodle.

FIELD.NAME: linkid
FIELD.COMMENT: logged resource_link_id

FIELD.NAME: resultid
FIELD.COMMENT: logged lis_result_sourcedid

TABLE.NAME: qtype_lti_usage
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps track of LTI user-vs-question usage.

FIELD.NAME: ltiid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the LTI tool instance

FIELD.NAME: instancecode
FIELD.COMMENT: Question InstanceCode in moodle.

FIELD.NAME: attemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the CodeExpert tool instance

FIELD.NAME: mattemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the CodeExpert tool instance

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle QuestionID

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle QuizID

FIELD.NAME: resourcelinkid
FIELD.COMMENT: logged resource_link_id

FIELD.NAME: resultid
FIELD.COMMENT: logged lis_result_sourcedid

FIELD.NAME: origin
FIELD.COMMENT: logged moodle origin

FIELD.NAME: destination
FIELD.COMMENT: logged CE destination
